item.description:
Saturday's forecast isn't too promising... So, if you are just hanging out Saturday afternoon? This may be a great option!

Julio's in Westboro always has some great wine and beer tastings - ALL FREE! They always draw quite a crowd. I have never been disappointed!
Anyway, today's event : 90+Cellars Wine Tasting paired up with the owner of BLUE RIBBON BBQ will be serving tasty ribs and brisket and selling their award winning Carolina BBQ sauce.

The tasting runs from 1:00 - 3pm

****NOTE: I will be away and unable to attend Just thought I would post as
they always have wonderful tastings.FYI: What they usually do for an event this size is
ask everyone for IDs , then give you a wristband. Be there earley enough - huge store, although there may be lines.
item.name: FREE- " 90+Cellars " Wine Tasting & Blue Ribbon BBQ Sliders
